channel.title: Gastronomy on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Gastronomy on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Toaster
item.description:
I thought I’d get a toaster – maybe start my day like a civilized person. I had to pay a bit more, so I wouldn’t have to think about quality, but not so much that I’d be a fool.

So I got this Bosch in metal case (mostly). It ended-up being metal only half-way since they had to have the control panel from black plastic. Anyway assuming European obsession with ecology I assume it’s not that bad.
